meanings.definition: Make (a person or animal) immune to infection by vaccination.
meanings.sent1: The doctor immunized the child against measles.
meanings.sent2: The nurse immunized the puppy to protect it from getting sick.
meanings.sent3: The superhero dog was immunized against the evil virus by a magical shot.
meanings.sent4: The shield of vaccination immunized the town from the dangerous disease.
meanings.sent5: The magical potion immunized the brave knight from any harm.

meanings.definition: Provide a person or animal with immunity against a particular disease.
meanings.sent1: The clinic immunized the community against the flu.
meanings.sent2: The vet immunized the cat to keep it healthy.
meanings.sent3: The jokester clown tried to immunize everyone with laughter against the boredom bug.
meanings.sent4: The knowledge gained from books can immunize the mind against ignorance.
meanings.sent5: The love and care of family can immunize the heart from loneliness.
